name: Upstairs (Movid)
description:
Idea
  • In this fast-paced addicting game, you need to control a ball to go upstairs.
  • There are enemies or obstacles  on the way. You have to predict their directions and pick the safest way for your delicate ball!
  • Of course, there are boosters, which help you freeze or shrink your enemies, or simply give you additional lives!
  • If you see a turning arrow, hit it and you can fly! Enjoy the colorful scenery under your feet!   

         

  • Earn money at checkpoints to purchase skins and trails for customization of your ball!
